description: Italy ends travel restrictions almost three months after lockdown measures began.
title: Coronavirus: Italy's Conte offers hope as travel restrictions end
title_page: Coronavirus: Italy's Conte offers hope as travel restrictions end - BBC News
maintext: They are not the only European countries exercising caution. Last week, Norway and Denmark announced they would allow travel between the two countries, but excluded Swedes from the deal. Sweden, which did not impose a strict lockdown, has suffered a far higher mortality rate than its Nordic neighbours, and the man behind the policy now says the decision led to too many deaths.
